body.AppendLine(string.Format("Error Message: " + ESBError.ErrorMessage)); if(context.Instance.IsDebugEnabled){ context.Instance.TraceDebug(string.Format("Sending email '{2}' from {0} to {1}",emailSender,emailList,emailSubject)); } context.Data.SetProperty("smtp", "To", emailList); context.Data.SetProperty("smtp", "From", emailSender); context.Data.SetProperty("smtp", "Subject", emailSubject); context.Data.SetProperty("smtp", "Body", body.ToString()); // Attach the original message as an attachment context.Data.Text = ESBError.OriginalMessage.ToString();
